changelog.zh:
- 修复：TV端观看历史记录问题（所有场景完整覆盖）
- 修复：TV端首页焦点导航问题（观看记录可跳转到继续观看按钮）
- 修复：首页点击频道重复记录观看历史的问题
- 新增：TV端分屏模式内切换频道自动记录观看历史
- 新增：TV端分屏模式退出后自动刷新观看历史
- 优化：首页显示8个分类（原5个）
changelog.en:
- Fixed: TV watch history recording issues (all scenarios covered)
- Fixed: TV home page focus navigation (watch history can jump to continue button)
- Fixed: Duplicate watch history recording when clicking channels from home
- Added: Auto-record watch history when switching channels in TV multi-screen mode
- Added: Auto-refresh watch history after exiting TV multi-screen mode
- Improved: Home page now shows 8 categories (was 5)
